command.title: INSERT INTO en Data Warehouse

command.full: INSERT INTO dbo.DimProduct VALUES (1, 'RING1', 'Bicycle bell', 'Accessories', 5.99), (2, 'BRITE1', 'Front light', 'Accessories', 15.49), (3, 'BRITE2', 'Rear light', 'Accessories', 15.49);
